請以有效的儲存體連接字串，建立應用程式設定。
lang.backend_error_MissingFunctionsExtensionV: 您的應用程式缺少 '{0}' 應用程式設定。若無該項設定，則一律會執行最新版的執行階段 (甚至跨越可能包含最新變更的主要版本更新)。建議將該值設定為目前最新的主要版本 (~ 1)，如此即可通知您有更新的版本可供更新。
lang.backend_error_StorageAccountConnectionSt: 儲存在 '{0}' 中的 Azure 儲存體帳戶連接字串為 null 或空白。必須要有此連接字串，函數應用程式才可運作。

lang.functionsRuntimeVersionMissingWarning: 您應用程式的執行階段版本尚未設定，因此無法啟動執行階段。請將執行階段版本更新至有效值 (例如 ~2)。
lang.functionsRuntimeVersionLatestOrBetaWarni: 您的應用程式目前釘選至執行階段版本 '{0}'。釘選至 '{0}' 表示您一律會執行最新的執行階段版本，即使在可能包含中斷性變更的主要版本更新間也一樣。建議您將值設定為特定主要版本 (例如 ~2)，以在有較新版本可供更新時收到通知。
lang.functionsRuntimeVersionLatestOrBetaWithE: 因為您的應用程式目前釘選至執行階段版本 '{0}'，所以應用程式正在使用最新的版本 ({1})。釘選至 '{0}' 表示您一律會執行最新的執行階段版本，即使在可能包含中斷性變更的主要版本更新間也一樣。建議您將值設定為特定主要版本 (例如 ~2)，以在有較新版本可供更新時收到通知。
lang.functionsRuntimeVersionNeedsUpdateWarnin: 您的應用程式目前釘選至執行階段版本 '{0}'。當此版本的支援結束時，您的應用程式會開始使用最新版本的執行階段，其主要版本可能不同且可能包含中斷性變更。建議您將值設定為特定主要版本 (例如 ~2)，以在有較新版本可供更新時收到通知。
lang.functionsRuntimeVersionInvalidWarning: 因為不支援您的自訂執行階段版本 ({0})，所以應用程式正在使用最新版本 {1}，而您將一律執行最新的執行階段版本，即使在可能包含中斷性變更的主要版本更新間也一樣。建議您將值設定為特定主要版本 (例如 ~2)，以在有較新版本可供更新時收到通知。
lang.functionsRuntimeVersionCustomInfo: 執行階段版本由 FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION 應用程式設定控制。假如設定的值無效或失去支援，您就會獲得最新版本，所以不建議設定自訂版本。因為主要版本更新可能包含中斷性變更，所以這可能會使您的函數處於中斷狀態。
lang.functionsRuntimeVersionExistingFunctions: 無法以現有的函數升級: 主要版本升級可能會對語言和繫結造成中斷性變更。升級執行階段的主要版本時，請考慮建立新的函數應用程式，並將您的函數移轉到這個新的應用程式。

en.backend_error_MissingAzureWebJobsDashboa: '{0}' application setting is missing from your app. This setting contains a connection string for an Azure Storage account that is needed for the monitoring view of your functions. en.backend_error_MissingAzureWebJobsStorage: '{0}' application setting is missing from your app. This setting contains a connection string for an Azure Storage account that is needed for the functions runtime to handle multiple instances synchronization, log invocation results, and other infrastructure jobs. Your function app will not work correctly without that setting.
Create the app setting with a valid storage connection string.
en.backend_error_MissingFunctionsExtensionV: '{0}' application setting is missing from your app. Without this setting you'll always be running the latest version of the runtime even across major version updates which might contain breaking changes. It's advised to set that value to the current latest major version (~1) and you'll get notified with newer versions for update.

en.swapWithPreviewInfoText: Swap with preview breaks down a normal swap into two phases. In phase one, any slot-specific application settings and connections strings on the destination will be temporarily copied to the source slot. This allows you to test the slot with its final configuration values. From here, you may choose to either cancel phase one to revert to your normal configuration, or proceed to phase two, which would remove the temporary config changes and complete swapping the source to destination slot.

en.functionsRuntimeVersionMissingWarning: The runtime version is not configured for your app. As a result the runtime cannot be started. Please update the runtime version to a valid value (e.g. ~2).
en.functionsRuntimeVersionLatestOrBetaWarni: Your app is currently pinned to runtime version '{0}'. Pinning to '{0}' means you will always be running the latest version of the runtime even across major version updates which might contain breaking changes. It is advised to set that value to a specific major version (e.g. ~2) and you will get notified with newer versions for update.
en.functionsRuntimeVersionLatestOrBetaWithE: Your app is currently pinned to runtime version '{0}', so your app is using the latest version ({1}). Pinning to '{0}' means you will always be running the latest version of the runtime even across major version updates which might contain breaking changes. It is advised to set that value to a specific major version (e.g. ~2) and you will get notified with newer versions for update.
en.functionsRuntimeVersionNeedsUpdateWarnin: Your app is currently pinned to runtime version '{0}'. When this version is no longer supported your app will start using the latest version of the runtime, which could be a different major version and might contain breaking changes. It is advised to set that value to a specific major version (e.g. ~2) and you will get notified with newer versions for update.
en.functionsRuntimeVersionInvalidWarning: Your custom runtime version ({0}) is not supported. As a result your app is using the latest version {1}, and you will always be running the latest version of the runtime even across major version updates which might contain breaking changes. It is advised to set that value to a specific major version (e.g. ~2) and you will get notified with newer versions for update.
en.functionsRuntimeVersionCustomInfo: The runtime version is controlled by the FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION app setting. Configuring a custom version is not advised because you will end up on the latest version if the configured value is invalid or becomes unsupported. This may leave your functions in a broken state since major version updates which might contain breaking changes.
